text: Pre-heat the oven to 400ºF (204ºC).  Spread the blanched almonds on a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake them for about 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly golden brown in color. Leave on the side at room temperature to cool. Combine the grapefruit juice, yogurt, mint, garlic, and salt in a small bowl.  Slice about half of the citrus fruit in individual segments (or pieces). Leave the others whole on the side. Add and fold the endive into the yogurt mixture.  Serve the dressed endive on a large serving plate or salad bowl.  Layer the cut fruit on top of the endive.  Chop the almonds in half and sprinkle on top of the fruit.  Place in the refrigerator for about 10 to 15 minutes to chill before serving.  Finished!
